mapper.select: select EV_NO, EV_TITLE, EV_CONTENT, EV_CDATE, EV_FILE, EV_HIT, EV_START, EV_END, EV_PEOPLE, EV_STATUS, EV_NOWPEOPLE, EV_TARGET, EV_PLACE, EV_IMG, EV_TIME, EV_TODAY, EV_PHONE from TB_EVENT where EV_NO = #{EV_NO}
select evc_no, ev_no, evc_commenter, evc_content, evc_cdate from tb_eventcomment where ev_no = #{ev_no}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_eventcomment(ev_no, evc_commenter, evc_content, evc_cdate) value(#{ev_no}, #{evc_commenter}, #{evc_content}, #{evc_cdate})
